description.label: Description
description.value: The creature has no rational thought or language. It shies away from fire and gains a @Condition[Broken] Condition if struck by it. In defense, it only uses the Dodge Skill. If it loses more than half its Wounds, it will attempt to Flee unless protecting its young or cornered, or unless it has the Territorial Trait. If so, it enters Frenzy. Bestial creatures have no Fellowship characteristic
